metadata.title: CVE-2022-48854 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Certified (xenial) - medium
metadata.description: In the Linux kernel, the following vulnerability has been resolved:net: arc_emac: Fix use after free in arc_mdio_probe()If bus->state is equal to MDIOBUS_ALLOCATED, mdiobus_free(bus) will freethe "bus". But bus->name is still used in the next line, which will leadto a use after free.We can fix it by putting the name in a local variable and make thebus->name point to the rodata section "name",then use the name in theerror message without referring to bus to avoid the uaf.

criterions.comment: linux-fips package in fips/xenial is affected and may need fixing.
